players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Alice, you stayed silent earlier. Can you share any thoughts or observations? We need to figure out who the mafia is quickly."
Diana: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night and found the proof. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
Bob: "Alice's silence is suspicious, but Diana's quick accusation is bold. If Diana is telling the truth, we should vote Alice. If not, Diana might be the mafia trying to frame Alice."
Diana: "I understand Bob's hesitation, but I have no reason to lie. Alice is the only mafia here, and voting her out now is our best chance to win."
